## welcome
This site functions as a personal archive for my works, my interests and shrines, as well as a creative exercise as I explore the world of static web coding.

As of March 2024, I mostly use RStudio to generate my HTML. It makes my life a lot easier in terms of testing and content control. I am currently working to make this site as responsive as possible.
